articles.author: sport
articles.title: Muhammad Ali's ex-wife lands in Kabul to open stadium amid Taliban's sports ban for women
articles.description: A former wife of legendary US boxer Muhammad Ali arrived in the Afghan capital, a Taliban government official said Friday, to reportedly open a stadium in a country where women are barred from sports.
articles.content: A former wife of legendary US boxer Muhammad Ali arrived in the Afghan capital, a Taliban government official said Friday, to reportedly open a stadium in a country where women are barred from sports.

articles.title: Shohei Ohtani: 'I came to the U.S. precisely to win a World Series'
articles.description: Dodgers star Shohei Ohtani sat down with FOX Sports' Kevin Burkhardt to discuss his goals, the pressure of being an international icon, and more.
articles.content:
Shohei Ohtani has not only had an historic career, he's had a particularly historic season, becoming the first player to steal at least 50 bases and slug at least 50 home runs in the same year.
